name: Walking Mystery
description:
This is my Level Design Assignment for my year 1 design class.

It is by no means something that is perfect or finished. But it mite be something I keep adding too as I gain more skills.

Please any feedback is greatly appreciated

Thank you for playing :)  

How to Install:

-Download ZIP file
-Extract Files
-Run WalkingMystery.exe in Folder 
-Enjoy

Just use ALT + F4 to exit the game.
